Knight.description: A stalwart defender with heavy armor and shield. Excels at close combat.

Shield Bash.description: Bashes enemy with shield, chance to stun

Whirlwind.description: Spins weapon hitting all nearby enemies

Mage.description: Master of arcane arts, wielding devastating elemental magic.

Firestorm.description: Summons a storm of fire that burns over time

Ice Prison.description: Encases enemy in ice, freezing them temporarily

Shadow.description: A stealthy assassin who strikes from darkness with precision.

Backstab.description: Sneak attack that guarantees critical hit

Poison Dart.description: Poisoned dart that deals damage over time

Paladin.description: Holy warrior who combines combat prowess with healing magic.

Holy Smite.description: Divine strike that deals extra damage to undead

Ranger.description: Expert marksman and tracker who fights from a distance.

Tracking Shot.description: Never misses and marks enemy for extra damage

Berserker.description: Unstoppable fury in battle, trading defense for overwhelming power.

Rage.description: Deals massive damage but takes 10% of damage dealt

Necromancer.description: Master of death magic who commands undead minions.

Raise Dead.description: Summons a skeleton warrior to fight for you

Life Drain.description: Steals health from enemy and heals yourself

3.name: Dark Dragon
3.description: A mighty dragon shrouded in darkness.

4.name: Shadow Lurker
4.description: A deadly phantom of the shadows.

10.name: Demon Lord
10.description: The supreme ruler of the abyss.

1.question: I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. What am I?

2.question: The more of this there is, the less you see. What is it?

3.question: I have cities, but no houses; forests, but no trees; and water, but no fish. What am I?

4.question: What can fill a room but takes up no space?

5.question: What has keys but can't open locks?

6.question: I am always hungry and will die if not fed, but whatever I touch will soon turn red. What am I?

7.question: I follow you all day and mimic your moves, but I vanish in darkness. What am I?

8.question: What has a heart that doesn't beat?

9.question: What can run but never walks, has a mouth but never talks?

10.question: What is always in front of you but can't be seen?

FLOOR_STORY.0: In the kingdom of Eldoria, darkness looms beneath the ancient Tower of Trials. You, a brave adventurer, enter the tower seeking to restore peace and claim glory.
FLOOR_STORY.1: Floor 1: Entrance Hall - Goblins lurk in the dim light.
FLOOR_STORY.2: Floor 2: Creeping Depths - Orcs and spiders stalk you.
FLOOR_STORY.3: Floor 3: Forgotten Barracks - Trolls and bandits await.
FLOOR_STORY.4: Floor 4: Phantom Chambers - Ghostly wraiths and snakes haunt.
FLOOR_STORY.5: Floor 5: Arcane Sanctuary - Warlocks and golems guard the halls.
FLOOR_STORY.6: Floor 6: Dragon's Lair - Face the Doom Bringer, the final boss.
FLOOR_STORY.7: Floor 7: Molten Core - Lava flows and fire elementals surge.
FLOOR_STORY.8: Floor 8: Frozen Abyss - Treacherous ice and frost titans dominate.
FLOOR_STORY.9: Floor 9: Crypt of Despair - Undead and necromancers lurk.
FLOOR_STORY.10: Floor 10: Throne of Chaos - Confront the Demon Lord, ruler of the abyss.
